review: I am a little disappointed with this product but it still has potential in the future.  For the price it's worth trying out.  Very easy install, great screen resolution.  My only issue is that it can't play your itunes library w/o a 3rd party app.  Google needs to add more things to watch.  Becasue if y ou want to watch anything besides youtube video' you need to pay for them...(HBO, NETFLIX ETC.)  But for the price it was wortha try and hope in the future Google adds more platforms.
